name: Dean's Honour Roll
description: I was awarded the dean's honour roll for getting an average above 80% in my classes at Conestoga College

name: Co-Op Student of the Year
description: I was awarded a Conestoga Co-Op Student of the Year Award in early 2016 for my Co-Op work at Brose Canada Inc. where I developed several web systems to help them optimize their production processes. This is a prestigious award that is given to students who demonstrate significant job achievement, academic achievement, and extracurricular involvement in the school and/or community.

name: Best in Category - SET Project Day
description: At SET project day 2017 I presented my capstone project and won first in my category. My project was a modern web-based game builder called gamepod.io that produced native web games.

name: Web Development - 3rd Place
description: I won 3rd place competing at the Skills Ontario web development compeition in 2014

name: Web Development - 1st Place
description: I won 1st place competing at the Skills Ontario web development compeition in 2015

name: Web Development - 1st Place
description: I won 1st place competing at the Skills Canada web development compeition in 2015
